description: Anonymous. Fols. 256; 26.9 x 197 cm.; written surface 17 x 12 cm.; 28 lines to page; on glazed European paper; in Maghribi; with vowel signs; entries in red and indigo; with rubrications. A comprehensive work on religious subjects discussing Ṣūfism, ceremonial cleanliness, prayer, alms, pilgrimage, the excellences of the caliph ʻAlī, the Prophet, the orthodox caliphs, the excellences of Makkah and al-Madīnah, the miracles of some of the pious Muslims and finally a chapter on the mercy of God and His forgiveness. Beg.: بسم الله ... اما بعد فهذا تألىف سعىد مبارك مفىد Colophon: وغىر ذلك من تفانىد والمحفوظات من امثال وحکم وقصائد تندرج في هذا الشأن وىتم به الطلاع [الاطلاع] على مقام ارباب الحقائق والعرفان حشرنا الله في زمرتهم واماتنا على محبتهم ونفعنا ببرکاتهم امىن A few marginal notes and glosses. MS in good condition; Arabic leather binding with flap; color stamped on cover and flap. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
